column2: lasting from March to the middle of June
column3: with average daily temperatures near 40 °C. They are followed by the monsoon season with heavy precipitation and somewhat lower temperatures. Durgapur receives most of its annual rainfall of around 52 inches during this season. The monsoon is followed by a mild
column4: dry winter from November to January. Temperatures are quite moderate
column5: with average daily temperatures near 16 °C. There is a short autumn at the end of October and a short spring in February
